he Lost Hunting Horn of the Mavran Maidens was a magical device that was extant by the midâ€“8 century DR.
At the very least, nothing happened when a cork rebounded from it.
The enigmatic device formed part of the collection that remained in Moonshorn Tower by the . Much of the collection was Netherese, but many things in it were insignificant.
